tool_description: Welcome to CalcX - Loan Calculator API, your all-in-one solution for seamless financial planning. This API empowers developers, fintech innovators, and businesses to integrate powerful Loan and Mortgage Calculators into their applications, providing users with accurate and insightful financial information.
name: CalcX -  Loan Calculator
title: CalcX -  Loan Calculator

api_list.name: Time and a Half Overtime
api_list.description: Calculate overtime pay using query parameters.

required_parameters.name: regular_hours
required_parameters.description: The number of regular hours worked.

required_parameters.name: standard_rate
required_parameters.description: The standard hourly wage for the employee.

optional_parameters.name: hours_time_half
optional_parameters.description: The number of hours worked at time and a half.

optional_parameters.name: currency
optional_parameters.description: The currency for formatting the calculated values.

optional_parameters.name: hours_triple
optional_parameters.description: The number of hours worked at triple time.

optional_parameters.name: hours_double
optional_parameters.description: The number of hours worked at double time.

api_list.name: Overtime Pay Weekly
api_list.description: Calculate overtime pay using query parameters.

required_parameters.name: hourly_wage
required_parameters.description: The hourly wage for the employee.

required_parameters.name: overtime_hours
required_parameters.description: The number of overtime hours worked per week.

required_parameters.name: regular_hours
required_parameters.description: The number of regular hours worked per week.

optional_parameters.name: currency
optional_parameters.description: The currency for formatting the calculated values.

optional_parameters.name: overtime_multiplier
optional_parameters.description: The multiplier applied to calculate overtime pay.

api_list.name: Overtime Pay Monthly
api_list.description: Calculate overtime pay using query parameters.

required_parameters.name: regular_hours
required_parameters.description: The number of regular hours worked per month.

required_parameters.name: hourly_wage
required_parameters.description: The hourly wage for the employee.

required_parameters.name: overtime_hours
required_parameters.description: The number of overtime hours worked per month.

optional_parameters.name: currency
optional_parameters.description: The currency for formatting the calculated values.

optional_parameters.name: overtime_multiplier
optional_parameters.description:
The multiplier applied to calculate overtime pay.
default: ***1.5***

api_list.name: Shift Finish Time Calculator
api_list.description: Calculate shift finish time using query parameters.

required_parameters.name: start_time
required_parameters.description: Start time of the shift in 12-hour format (e.g., **9:00 AM**).

required_parameters.name: duration
required_parameters.description: Duration of the shift in hours.

required_parameters.name: break_duration
required_parameters.description: Break duration in minutes.

api_list.name: Custom Shift Pay Calculator
api_list.description: Retrieve pay calculations based on query parameters.

required_parameters.name: overtime_hourly_wage
required_parameters.description: The overtime hourly wage in numeric format. Usually 1.5x the hourly wage rate.

required_parameters.name: hourly_wage
required_parameters.description: The hourly wage in numeric format.

required_parameters.name: hours_worked
required_parameters.description: Number of regular hours.

optional_parameters.name: work_weeks_per_year
optional_parameters.description: Number of work weeks in a year.

optional_parameters.name: shift_hours
optional_parameters.description: Number of hours in a shift.

optional_parameters.name: currency
optional_parameters.description:
Currency code for formatting pay amounts.
[All the supported currencies for this endpoint](https://rapidapi.com/kidddevs/api/calcx-loan-calculator/tutorials/endpoints-supported-currencies)

optional_parameters.name: work_days_per_week
optional_parameters.description: Number of days worked in a week.

api_list.name: 12Hours Shift Pay Calculator
api_list.description: Retrieve pay calculations based on query parameters.

required_parameters.name: hourly_wage
required_parameters.description: The hourly wage in numeric format.

required_parameters.name: overtime_hourly_wage
required_parameters.description: The overtime hourly wage in numeric format. Usually 1.5x the hourly wage rate.

required_parameters.name: hours_worked
required_parameters.description: Number of regular hours.

optional_parameters.name: work_weeks_per_year
optional_parameters.description: Number of work weeks in a year.

optional_parameters.name: currency
optional_parameters.description:
Currency code for formatting pay amounts.
[All the supported currencies for this endpoint](https://rapidapi.com/kidddevs/api/calcx-loan-calculator/tutorials/endpoints-supported-currencies)

api_list.name: Calculate Salary
api_list.description: Retrieve salary details using query parameters. Effortlessly customize your calculations by specifying salary, pay period, working hours, holidays, and vacation days. This endpoint supports various periods, including hourly, weekly, bi-weekly, semi-monthly, monthly, quarterly, and annual.

required_parameters.name: holidays_per_year
required_parameters.description: How many holidays you enjoy each year.

required_parameters.name: hours_per_week
required_parameters.description: Specify the number of hours you work per week.

required_parameters.name: salary
required_parameters.description: Your base salary amount. The starting point for all calculations.

required_parameters.name: days_per_week
required_parameters.description: Indicate the number of days you work each week.

required_parameters.name: period
required_parameters.description: Choose your preferred pay period – ***hour***, ***day***, ***week***, ***bi-week***, ***semi-month***, ***month***, ***quarter***, or ***annual***.

required_parameters.name: vacation_per_year
required_parameters.description: How many vacation days you get annually.

optional_parameters.name: currency
optional_parameters.description:
Choose your preferred currency code (default is USD).
[All the supported currencies for this endpoint](https://rapidapi.com/kidddevs/api/calcx-loan-calculator/tutorials/endpoints-supported-currencies)

api_list.name: Calculate Fixed Payment Loan
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to compute comprehensive details for a fixed payment loan, providing insights into the amortization schedule, total payments, total interest, and more.

required_parameters.name: monthly_payment
required_parameters.description: The fixed monthly payment you intend to make.

required_parameters.name: amount
required_parameters.description: The loan amount.

required_parameters.name: rate
required_parameters.description: The annual interest rate for the loan.

optional_parameters.name: currency
optional_parameters.description:
The currency in which the loan amount and payments are expressed. It is case-insensitive.
[All the supported currencies for this endpoint](https://rapidapi.com/kidddevs/api/calcx-loan-calculator/tutorials/endpoints-supported-currencies)

api_list.name: Fixed Term Loan
api_list.description: This endpoint allows users to perform a fixed term loan calculation using query parameters.

required_parameters.name: amount
required_parameters.description: The loan amount.

required_parameters.name: rate
required_parameters.description: The annual interest rate.

required_parameters.name: term_years
required_parameters.description: The term of the loan in years.

optional_parameters.name: currency
optional_parameters.description:
The currency in which the results are presented (case-insensitive, default is USD).
[All the supported currencies for this endpoint](https://rapidapi.com/kidddevs/api/calcx-loan-calculator/tutorials/endpoints-supported-currencies)

api_list.name: Calculate Mortgage
api_list.description: Calculates mortgage-related values based on the provided input parameters. This endpoint supports various amortization frequencies, including monthly, semi-monthly, bi-weekly, and weekly.

required_parameters.name: currency
required_parameters.description:
The currency in which the results should be presented. Defaults to **USD**.

[All the supported currencies for this endpoint](https://rapidapi.com/kidddevs/api/calcx-loan-calculator/tutorials/endpoints-supported-currencies)

required_parameters.name: rate
required_parameters.description: The annual interest rate for the loan.

required_parameters.name: term_years
required_parameters.description: The number of years for which the loan is taken.

required_parameters.name: amount
required_parameters.description: The total loan amount requested.

required_parameters.name: down_payment
required_parameters.description: The initial down payment made. Defaults to 0.

api_list.name: Calculate Auto Loan
api_list.description: Calculate auto loan-related information based on provided parameters, including monthly payments, total loan cost, and an amortization schedule.

required_parameters.name: price
required_parameters.description: **price** (Decimal): The total price of the vehicle.

required_parameters.name: term_months
required_parameters.description: **term_months** (Integer): The loan term in months.

required_parameters.name: rate
required_parameters.description: **rate** (Decimal): The annual interest rate.

optional_parameters.name: down_payment
optional_parameters.description: **down_payment** (Decimal, default: 0): The down payment amount.

optional_parameters.name: trade_in_value
optional_parameters.description: **trade_in_value** (Decimal, default: 0): The value of a vehicle traded in.

optional_parameters.name: sales_tax_rate
optional_parameters.description: **sales_tax_rate** (Decimal, default: 0): The sales tax rate as a percentage.

optional_parameters.name: discount
optional_parameters.description: **discount** (Decimal, default: 0): Cash incentives or discounts applied to the vehicle

optional_parameters.name: currency
optional_parameters.description:
**currency** (String, default: 'USD'): The currency for displaying amounts.

[All the supported currencies for this endpoint](https://rapidapi.com/kidddevs/api/calcx-loan-calculator/tutorials/endpoints-supported-currencies)

optional_parameters.name: other_fees
optional_parameters.description: **other_fees** (Decimal, default: 0): Other fees associated with the loan.

api_list.name: Calculate Loan (GET)
api_list.description: This endpoint calculates the total cost of a loan given the loan amount, interest rate, and repayment term.

required_parameters.name: loan
required_parameters.description: The loan amount as a float. **Example: loan=10000**.

required_parameters.name: rate
required_parameters.description: The annual interest rate as a float. **Example: rate=5.5**.

required_parameters.name: term
required_parameters.description: The repayment term in months as an integer. **Example: term=12**.

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: The loan type as a string. This parameter is case-insensitive and can take one of the following values:  **business**, **student**, **medical** or **personal**. (optional)

optional_parameters.name: extra
optional_parameters.description: The extra payment per month as a float. **Example: extra=500.0**. **Default value: 0.0**. (optional)

optional_parameters.name: currency
optional_parameters.description:
The desired currency for the response. Defaults to **USD**.
[All the supported currencies for this endpoint](https://rapidapi.com/kidddevs/api/calcx-loan-calculator/tutorials/endpoints-supported-currencies)
